/// Options to define how Ownership Transfer is handled per PhotonView. ...
/// Ownership is fixed. Instantiated objects stick with their creator, scene objects always belong to the Master ...
/// Ownership can be taken away from the current owner who can't object. ...
/// Ownership can be requested with PhotonView.RequestOwnership but the current owner has to agree to give up own ...
